# Intro to Forecast, GGplots and pipes

### shortcut for rmarkdown box Ctrl/CMD + Opt + I


### Shortcut for pipes Ctrl+Shift+M, Cmd+Shift+M.

```{r}
library(forecast)
library(ggplot2)

# ETS forecasts
USAccDeaths %>%
  ets %>%
  forecast %>%
  autoplot
```

```{r}
# Automatic ARIMA forecasts
WWWusage %>%
  auto.arima %>%
  forecast(h=20) %>%
  autoplot
```


```{r}
# ARFIMA forecasts
library(fracdiff)
x <- fracdiff.sim( 100, ma=-.4, d=.3)$series
arfima(x) %>%
  forecast(h=30) %>%
  autoplot
```

  
```{r}
# Forecasting with STL
USAccDeaths %>%
  stlm(modelfunction=ar) %>%
  forecast(h=36) %>%
  autoplot
```
